title: Pixel 4a touch is not working. Initially it started with right side bottom didn't work.
content:
My pixel 4a touch is not working. It started with right side bottom. Later whole left side not working. I had updated android 2 months back. I didn't face touch issue since 2 months.

I am not using screen guard/protector.

Also, I tried factory reset but it didn't help.


Has anyone facing this issue?
